Recommendation Systems

Dec 2, 2014

The accurate item and music recommendations of Amazon.com and Pandora.com respectively, have always astounded me. Each system is unique -- tailored and optimized with different considerations in mind. In order to understand how these recommendation systems work, I decided build my own.

Using the dataset provided by the Yelp Dataset Challenge, I built a basic Recommendation System using collaborative filtering

This recommendation system is an ongoing project that will push me to dive deeper and build more sophisticated recommenders while sharpening my python skills.

Please feel free to take a look at the recommendation system I have built so far here: Recommendation System
